Following a procedure described by Rahmat et al. [ 15], 6.9 × 10 5 of MDA-MB-231 and MCF-7 cells were plated in 96-well plate and grown in 200 µL complete growth media (CGM) and treated for 24 h, 48 h, and 72 h, respectively. IC 50 of the extract was added in 96-well plates in serial dilution (100 μg/mL–5.625 µg/mL), and then, 20 μL of MTT was added into each well and nurtured for 4 h. Afterward, to liquefy and solubilize the colored crystals, 100 μL of DMSO was added into each well, and absorbance was read at 570 nm using an ELISA reader (AWARENESS-State Fax, USA).
